overview: October 27, 2019, the 100th anniversary of Korean cinema.  However, while preparing for the stage of reenactment of the first Korean film known as 'Fidelity Vomiting', the  biggest controversy that will shake up 100 years of Korean film history comes to the surface...  The best sleight of hand in the history of Korean cinema unfolds over the 'first Korean movie'!
title: After that, 100 years of fighting
